name: EvoCube
description:
Made in 6 days for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 219

THEME: Evolution

It is your normal tower defense kind of game, but rather than having to upgrade each tower, each generation of towers have their own stats. After wiping out all the enemies you will be able to choose 1 out of 3 EVOLUTION choices to apply to the next generation of towers. These evolutions increase some stats while sometimes coming with the price of lowering another. See how long you can survive in the 10 unique levels.

Sounds from https://freesound.org/

All music made in https://www.strofe.com/
